query.body: select distinct u from User as u left outer join BundleACL as bACL with bACL.user.id = u.id inner join bACL.bundle as b inner join b.course as c where u.id in (:user) and c.id = :course
select count (c) from Course as c inner join c.requirementSet as req where req.id = :req

macros.body: inner join fetch b.bundleACLSet as bACL inner join fetch b.course as c inner join fetch c.courseACL_Set as cACL
inner join fetch b.bundleACLSet as bACL inner join bACL.user as u inner join b.course as c inner join c.courseACL_Set as cACL

query.body:
select b from Bundle as b
where b.id=:id

select b from Bundle as b
inner join bACL.user as u inner join u.group as g where c.name = :course and g.name = :group and u.lastName = :lastName and u.firstName = :firstName and u.fatherName = :fatherName

select b from Bundle as b
inner join u.group as g where u.id = :user and c.id = :course

select b from Bundle as b
inner join u.group as g where b.state != 'ACCEPTED' and g.id in (:group) and c.id = :course
select distinct c from Bundle as b inner join b.bundleACLSet as bACL inner join b.course as c inner join fetch c.courseACL_Set as cACL where bACL.user.id = :user

select b from Bundle as b
where c.id=:course and b.bundleType.id =:bt and b.num = :num and b.state = 'ACCEPTED'
